rukus.text: 67|15|Tini'i to tomadera jan'ya yaminake sugama kare diyechena; ata'eba tomara era dika-digante bicarana kara ebam tamra deya riyika theke tomara ahara kara; ara punarut'thana to tamra'i kache.
67|16|Tomara ki e theke nirbhaya hayecha ye, yini asamane rayechena [1] tini tomaderake saha yaminake dhbasiye debena, atahpara ta hathat kare'i thara thara kare kampate thakabe
67|17|athaba tomara ki e theke nirbhaya hayecha ye, asamane yini rayechena tini tomadera upara kankarabarsi jhanjha pathabena? Takhana tomara janate parabe kirupa chila amara satarkabani [1]
67|18|ara edera purbabartigana'o mithyaropa karechila; phale kirupa hayechila amara pratyakhyana (sasti).
67|19|Tara ki laksya kare na tadera upare pakhidera prati, yara pakha bistara kare o sankucita kare? Dayamaya allaha'i taderake sthira rakhena. Niscaya tini sabakichura samyaka drasta.
67|20|Dayamaya allaha chara tomadera emana kono sain'yabahini ache ki, yara tomaderake sahayya karabe? Kaphirara to rayeche prabancanara madhye.
67|21|Emana ke ache, ye tomaderake riyika dana karabe, yadi tini tamra riyika bandha kare dena? Baram tara abadhyata o satya bimukhataya abicala rayeche.
67|22|Ye byakti jhumke mukhe bhara diye cale, se-i ki thika pathe cale, na ki se byakti ye soja haye sarala pathe cale [1]
67|23|baluna, ‘tini'i tomaderake srsti karechena ebam tomaderake diyechena srabanasakti, drstisakti o antahkarana. Tomara khuba alpa'i krtajnata prakasa kara.’
67|24|Baluna, ‘tini'i yamine tomaderake srsti kare chariye diyechena ebam tamra'i kache tomaderake samabeta kara habe.’
67|25|Ara tara bale, ‘tomara yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe bala, e pratisruti kakhana bastabayita habe?’
67|26|Baluna, ‘era jnana sudhu allah‌ra'i kache ache, ara ami to spasta satarkakari matra.’
67|27|Atahpara tara yakhana ta asanna dekhabe takhana kaphiradera cehara mlana haye parabe ebam bala habe, ‘eta'i hala ta ya tomara dabi karechile.’
67|28|Baluna, ‘tomara amake jana'o--- yadi allaha amake o amara sangiderake dhbansa karena athaba amadera prati daya pradarsana karena, tabe kaphiraderake ke raksa karabe yantranadayaka sasti hate
67|29|baluna, ‘tini'i rahamana, amara tamra upara imana enechi ebam tamra'i upara ta'oyakkula karechi. Atahpara acire'i tomara janate parabe ke spasta bibhraantite rayeche.’
67|30|Baluna, ‘tomara amake jana'o, yadi pani bhugarbhe tomadera nagalera ba'ire cale yaya, takhana ke tomaderake ene debe prabahamana pani?’
